Room.Name: Marina Way/Netherworld Lane Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Marina Way and Netherworld Lane.
Room.LongDescription: Marina Way continues to the north and south, intersecting Netherworld Lane, which runs east and west. Marina Way heads south towards the Oceancrest Central Arena. It is advised that if you are going to the arena you should first stop at the Arena Events and Information Center found on Main Street, north of Overland Drive. You may obtain a map there. Netherworld Lane runs east towards the Necropolis, where Oceancrest's brave and elite are buried.
